text: The 1989–90 Detroit Red Wings season was the Red Wings' 58th season, the franchise's 64th. The season involved drafting Sergei Fedorov and Nicklas Lidstrom. Until 2016-17 this was the last season that the Red Wings failed to make the playoffs. ==Offseason== ===NHL Draft=== {| class="wikitable" ! bgcolor="#DDDDFF" width="2.75%" | Round ! bgcolor="#DDDDFF"
